Text:
For fans of Maria Mckee I recommend the "Then you can tell me goodbye" track. I downloaded it a few years ago, but thought I'd lost it. So I looked everywhere on the net to find it, but it was impossible to find. Then I fortunately found it on some back up dvd... 
As far as I know this is the only place on the net where you can find this excellent track (but I might of course be wrong, it's been known to happen..)
